attributes.action: Schools let students go the toilet in lesson
attributes.additional_details: So kids don’t have bladder problems when they grow up
attributes.background: Let kids go to the toilet it’s a human right

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Require schools to allow students to have access to the toilet during lessons:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422
